src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Fi yawm al-ethnayn, sarra7at assekretera adda2ima fi lajnat Nobel lil adab fi al- Akadimiyya Assuwaydiya, assayida Sara Danyus, khilal barnamajen idha3iyyen 3ala radyo Sveriges fi Assuwayed, anna al-lajna qad takhalat 3an badhel juhudiha fi al-wusul ila Bob Dylan ba3da fashaliha fi attaswul ma3ahou bi sha2en fawzihi bi ja2izat Nobel  fi al-abad li 3am 2016.
hyp_text: Fi yawm al-ithnayn, Sara Danius, katib al-muwa7id al-dawli lil-Jam3iyya al-Nobel li-al-Adab fi al-Majma3 al-Shwidi, 3arada khutbatan 3ala mawaqit al-sawt 3ala Sveriges Radio fi Swaydan khutbatan, anna al-Jam3iyya lam takun tasta3mil al-talab ila Bub Dulan 3ala ganihi al-fadhil bi-al-Jayhiz al-Nobel fi al-Adab sanat 2016, wa kharijat isti3malaha min al-talab ilayhi.

src_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ref_text: Wa bi-sifatihi mustasharan li amen al-qawmi, fa qad sa3ad Brzezinski al-sayed Carter fi al-ta3amol al-diblomasy ma3 al-shu2oun al-3alamiya, mithil intifaqiyat Camp David 3am 1978, wa tatbi3 al-3alakat al-amrikiya w siniya, wa thawra al-iraniyya al-lati addat ila azmat ar-raha2en al-iraniya 3am 1979, wal-ghazuw al-sovyeti li Afghanistan 3am 1979.
hyp_text: Wa huwa maa NSA 3a3ad bi-Carter fi tafasil al-dawla al-3alamiyya, kama al-mu3a3adat al-Kamp Daivid, 1978; wa ta7qiq al-urth al-mutahawil bayna al-wusta al-mirriqiyya wa al-sina wa al-mu2aqqab bi al-akhira 1970at; wa al-thawra al-iraniyya, allatih tad3ala ila al-mushkil al-irani, 1979; wa al-inbasa al-shuyukiyya fi Afganistan, 1979.

src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: Wa qala Glen Cushing min Fariq al-mas7 al-jiyoloji al-amriki (USGS) attabi3 li jami3at shamal Arizona al-lati taqa3 fi Flagstaff fi wiliyat Arizona:”Inna sulukahum al-7arari laysa thabitan mithal al-kuhuf al-kabira 3ala al-ared al-lati ghaliban ma tu7afidhu 3ala darajat 7arara thabita ila 7adden ma,lakinani atafiqu ma3 kawniha thuquban 3amiqa”.

src_text: The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar.
ref_text: Yatawajad al nemer fil majmu3ah nafsiha (Genus Panthera) al lati tadom al 2usud, wal fuhud, wal numur al-Amerikiyya (jaguars). Hadhihi al sunnuriyyat al arba3ah hiya al wa7idah al lati tusdir sawt al za2ir.
hyp_text: Al-tayrur fi jama3a wahida (Jins Panthira) ma3 al-asad, al-namar, wa al-sabir, wa al-gawyar. Hatha al-arba3 al-quwwa hiya al-wahida allati tata3alliq al-nughay.

src_text: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
ref_text: Shuyyida 2al haram 2al akbar ka naw3 min 2al takareem lel fer3an 5ofo, baynama tamma bena2 2al 3aded min 2al 2ahramat, wal maqaber, wal ma3abed, 2al 2asghar 7ajman li takreem zawjat 5ofo wa 2afrad 2usratehe.
hyp_text: Kana al-haram al-kabir khalaqa lil-tahsin lil-Pharaoh Khufu, wa kathir min al-haram al-saghira, al-qubur, wa al-masajid khalaqa lil-zawjat wa al-ahliyyin Khufu.

hyp_text: Almanya kana dawla mukhtalata fi harb al-2alamiyya al-thaniya, wa dhalika 3ala ta3a3ud bayna al-ittihad al-shurvi wa al-wilaya al-muttahida. Wa ba3d irtifa3 harb al-2alamiyya, ta7addud al-nizam wa al-ta3qim wa al-thaqafa 3ala an yata3addud al-dawlaat.

hyp_text: Wa ma3a dhalika, kanat hawliyatuhum takhrijat al-mu3taqalan ighla7atan fi laylatin, idha dakhala 800,000 jalaa2 min al-jaysh al-ahmar al-shurvi al-ittihad wa khalaqat al-jawwi al-Baylausi wa al-Ukrayniyya ba3d al-inbasa 3ala al-manzil al-sharqiyya li-Puland wa mukhalafa bi-mithaq al-salaam al-Riga wa mithaq al-mu3aada al-shurvi-Pulandi wa mithaq al-mu3aada al-ittihad al-duwali wa al-mu3aada al-mutlaqi.

hyp_text: Kan Hershey wa Chase ista3malu al-fajaj, aw al-ghadhab, lil-istirzak al-jins al-dhikri lahum fi qaraba al-baktriyya.

src_text: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left.

src_text: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.

src_text: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
ref_text: Wa 7atta mina anna7iya attaqlidiya, wa ma3a dhalik, lam yashtarik jami3 assamiyin fi tarbiyat arrinna 3ala nitaq wasi3, wa lakinnahum kanu ya3ishun min sayd al-asmak wa assayd al-barry wa ma shabah dhalik, 7aythu kana mu3dhamuhum min 7ayawanat al-jar.
hyp_text: Wa ma3a al-7adith, wa laakin lam yakun kull Sámi ma3a al-mashtari3 fil rasikh al-ri7a7 al-kabira, wa kana yasta3mlu min al-sughur wa al-tarshid wa al-mu7tasim, wa kana al-ri7a7at khassatan 3ala al-hiyalan.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: {"translation": "Wa ma3a dhalika, fa enna jami3 al-Baljikiyyin wal Swisriyyin al-natiqin bil Faransiyya sa-yata3allamun al-Fransiyya al-qiyasiyya fil madaris, lidha sa-yakunun qadirin 3ala fehmika 7atta en stakhdamata nidham attarqim al-Faransy al-qiyasi."}

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: {"translation": "Wa 3ala mar al qurun, bana annas tarrasat bi 3inaya 3ala al manadhir attabi3iyya al wa3ira wa shadidat al in7idar wusulan ila al mun7adarat al mutilla 3ala al ba7er."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: {"translation": "Tamma ighla8 800 mil min nizam khat anabib Trans-Alaska ba3da tasarub alaf al-baramil min annift al-kham janob Firbanks, Alaska."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: {"translation": "Kanat 2al manateq 2al 7aleyya min Baljeka juz2an min Luxembourg fil madi wa lakennaha 2asba7at Baljeka ba3d 2al thawra 2al Baljekeyya fi thalatheneyyat 2al qarn 2al tase3 3ashar."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: {"translation": "Asba7a mawqe3 The Onion imbraturiyyat akhbar mu7akat sakhira 7aqiqiyya, ma3a isdarin matbu3 wa mawqa3in iliktroniy jadhaba akthar min 5 malayin za2ir fi shahr Oktober/tishrin al-thani, wa i3lanat khassa, wa shabaka ikhbariyya 3ala madar 24 sa3a, wa mudawinat sawtiyya, wa atlas 3alamiy tamma itlaquhu mu2akharan wa yusamma Our Dumb World \"3alamuna al-ghabiy\"."}

src_text: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
ref_text: Ya3mal al-3adid min Assamiyin al-yawm fi furu3 attijara al-7aditha. Tu3addu assiya7a dakhlan muhimman fi Sápmi, wa hiya mintaqat Assamiyyin.
hyp_text: Al-yawm kathirun min Sámi ya3malun fi al-tijarat al-mu3asira. Al-siyaha huwa rikaz al-ma3ash wa Sápmi, 2al-mintaqa al-Sámiyya.
